title: IPropertyManagerPageControl.ShowBubbleTooltip
description: Displays a bubble ToolTip containing the specified title, message, and bitmap.
signature:
void ShowBubbleTooltip( 
   System.String
Title
,
   System.String
Message
,
   System.String
BmpFile
)

parameters.name: Title
parameters.description: Title to display in bubble ToolTip

parameters.name: Message
parameters.description: Message to display in bubble ToolTip

parameters.name: BmpFile
parameters.description: Path and filename of bitmap to display in bubble ToolTip

remarks: A bubble ToolTip is useful for validating data typed or selected by users in controls on a PropertyManager page.
